Controller Data API.name: GET all controllers
Controller Data API.desc: Returns list of all controllers data

Controller Data API.name: Insert controller data
Controller Data API.desc: Add a controller data into database

Switch Data API.name: Get all switch data from a local controller
Switch Data API.desc: Return all switch data from specific controller
Switch Data API.exp_res:
[
{
‘id’: 234,
‘lc_id’: 123,
‘dpid’: ‘00000001’,
‘ip’: “10.0.4.10”,
‘desc’: “Switch in room 234”,
‘gateway’: True
},
{
‘id’: 235,
‘lc_id’: 123,
‘dpid’: ‘00000002’,
‘ip’: “10.0.4.11”,
‘desc’: “Switch in room 235”,
‘gateway’: False
}
]

Switch Data API.name: Get single switch data
Switch Data API.desc: Using switch id and local controller id to get a switch data.

Switch Data API.name: Add a switch data to database
Delete a switch data from database

Link Data API.name: Get all links data from local controller
Link Data API.desc: Return all links id from specific local controller.

Link Data API.name: Get link data
Link Data API.desc: Get link detail by link id

Port Data API.name: Get all port
Port Data API.desc: Get all port data from from specific switch

Port Data API.name: Get port data
Port Data API.desc: Get single port data from database

Port Data API.name: Add port data
Port Data API.desc: Add a port data to switch

Port Data API.name: Update port data
Port Data API.desc: Update port data with port id and port data

Port Data API.name: Delete port data
Port Data API.desc: Delete port data from database by using port id

Host Data API.name: Get all host data from controller
Host Data API.desc: Get all host data from database by using controller id
Host Data API.exp_res:
[
{
“id”: 5,
“mac”: “12:34:56:78:90:AB”,
“port_id”: 7,
“desc”: “Web server in room 345”
},
{
“id”: 6,
“mac”: “12:34:56:78:90:AC”,
“port_id”: 8,
“desc”: “DB server in room 345”
}
]

Host Data API.name: Get host data
Host Data API.desc: Get single host data from database by using host id

Flow entry Data API.name: Get all flow entry data
Flow entry Data API.desc: Get all flow entry data from database by using switch id.

resp.desc: switch id for for this entry
idle time out for this entry
in port for this entry match
ethernet destination for this entry match
ethernet source for this entry match
vlan id for this entry match
IPv4 source for this entry match
IPv4 destination for this entry match
IPv6 source for this entry match
IPv6 destination for this entry match
tunnel id for this entry match
output port for this entry action
group id for this entry action
queue id for this entry action
raw text data for this flow entry (json)
